item.title: {help} fun pk {help}
item.dc:creator: @X-X_G_X-X X-X--G--X-X
item.description:
@X-X_G_X-X wrote:

I am trying to make a funpk area, and im almost 100% all my codes are correct, but when I go to the funpk area it is NOT wildy. I have added a funpk boolean, aswell as added it to attackingOn2 and castOn. I have added a death method also. If you can help it would be apreciated.

Here is what I have:

public boolean inFunPk1v1() {
if (absX >= 3021 && absX <= 3044 && absY >= 3297 && absY <= 3314) {
return true;

} else {
  return false;
}

}

if((AttackingOn2.combatLevel + wildyLevel < combatLevel || combatLevel + wildyLevel < AttackingOn2.combatLevel) && !inFunPk1v1())

if((castOnPlayer.combatLevel + wildyLevel < combatLevel || combatLevel + wildyLevel < castOnPlayer.combatLevel) && !inFunPk1v1())

Then I have my death method…

PLEASE HELP!

Read full topic
